ygData.subject: Re: Plus mana items versus Plus Int and Wisdom
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A plus mana item will add the specified amount of mana to your mana pool. A plus intelligence item will effect your mana indirectly.  A good rule of thumb
ygData.messageBody:
Don Bickner wrote:

> Hello everyone, Can anyone tell me the difference between a +mana
> item versus a +int and wis item. I have a chance to buy the Savants
> cap for about 30 plat and am wondering why it could be worth that much
> since I could just a + mana ring for a whole lot less. Also in wearing
> the cap I would have to give up on my Halo of light. Thanks
> Kueken, Mith Marr

A plus mana item will add the specified amount of mana to your mana
pool.
A plus intelligence item will effect your mana indirectly. A good rule
of thumb is that for every extra 5 points of intelligence you will add 1
point of mana per level
